issue.title: [C++] Implement basic Filter expression classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6243](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6243). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will draft the basic classes for creating boolean expressions that are passed to the DataSources/DataFragments for predicate push-down.
